doc.field: Administrative Papers of the President George Bugliarello
Administrative Papers of the President George Bugliarello

The additional material in this series was donated to the Poly Archives by Virginia Bugliarello on October 24, 2013. Some of the material was integrated into existing series within the collection, including Speeches & Symposia, Publications & Manuscripts, Correspondence, Clippings, and Photographs. The remainder of the additional material, which could not be integrated due to physical limitations, is in Addendum II.
Virginia Bugliarello's donation letter for this additional material is in the first box (Box 50) of Addendum II.
Administrative Papers of the President George Bugliarello
